verses.verse: Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H1>father<s%> and my <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and their <S%H6629>flocks<s%>, and their <S%H1241>herds<s%>, and all that they <S%H935>have<s%>, are come out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>; <S%H776>and<s%>, behold, they are in the land of <S%H1657>Goshen<s%>.
And <S%H7097>from<s%> among his <S%H251>brethren<s%> he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, and <S%H3322>presented<s%> them <S%H6440>unto<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, What is your <S%H4639>occupation<s%>? And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, Thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> are <S%H7462>shepherds<s%>, both <S%H1>we<s%>, and our fathers.

And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, To <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> are we <S%H935>come<s%>; for there is no <S%H4829>pasture<s%> for thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>' <S%H6629>flocks<s%>; for the <S%H7458>famine<s%> is <S%H3515>sore<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>: now <S%H5650>therefore<s%>, we pray thee, let thy servants <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen<s%>.
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thy <S%H1>father<s%> and thy <S%H251>brethren<s%> are come unto <S%H935>thee<s%>:

the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> is before <S%H6440>thee<s%>; in the <S%H4315>best<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3427>make<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%> and thy <S%H251>brethren<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%>; in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen<s%> let them <S%H3427>dwell<s%>: and if thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> any <S%H2428>able<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> among <S%H7760>them<s%>, then make them <S%H8269>rulers<s%> over my <S%H4735>cattle<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> brought <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, and set <S%H5975>him<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>: and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>.
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H4100>How<s%> many are the days of the years of thy <S%H3117>life<s%>?

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, The <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> of my <S%H4033>pilgrimage<s%> are a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>: <S%H4592>few<s%> and <S%H7451>evil<s%> have been the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> of my <S%H2416>life<s%>, and they have not <S%H5381>attained<s%> unto the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the <S%H2416>life<s%> of my <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of their <S%H4033>pilgrimage<s%>.
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3427>placed<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them a <S%H272>possession<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, in the <S%H4315>best<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H7486>Rameses<s%>, as <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3557>nourished<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, and his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and all his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>household<s%>, with <S%H3899>bread<s%>, <S%H6310>according<s%> to their <S%H2945>families<s%>.

And there was no <S%H3899>bread<s%> in all the <S%H776>land<s%>; for the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>sore<s%>, so that the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> <S%H3856>fainted<s%> by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of the <S%H7458>famine<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> gathered <S%H3950>up<s%> all the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, for the <S%H7668>grain<s%> which they <S%H7666>bought<s%>: and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> into <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And when the <S%H3701>money<s%> was all <S%H8552>spent<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, all the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3051>Give<s%> us <S%H3899>bread<s%>: for why should we <S%H4191>die<s%> in thy <S%H3701>presence<s%>? for our money <S%H656>faileth<s%>.
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3051>Give<s%> your <S%H4735>cattle<s%>; and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you for your <S%H4735>cattle<s%>, if <S%H3701>money<s%> <S%H656>fail<s%>.

And they <S%H935>brought<s%> their <S%H4735>cattle<s%> unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>; and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H3899>bread<s%> in exchange for the <S%H5483>horses<s%>, and for the <S%H6629>flocks<s%>, and for <S%H4735>the<s%> <S%H1241>herds<s%>, and for the <S%H2543>asses<s%>: and he <S%H5095>fed<s%> them with <S%H3899>bread<s%> in exchange for all their <S%H4735>cattle<s%> for that <S%H8141>year<s%>.

And when that <S%H8141>year<s%> was <S%H8552>ended<s%>, they <S%H935>came<s%> unto him the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3582>him<s%>, We will not hide from my <S%H113>lord<s%>, how that our <S%H3701>money<s%> is all <S%H8552>spent<s%>; and the <S%H4735>herds<s%> of <S%H929>cattle<s%> are <S%H413>my<s%> <S%H113>lord<s%>'s; there is nought <S%H7604>left<s%> in the <S%H6440>sight<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%>, but our <S%H1472>bodies<s%>, and our <S%H127>lands<s%>:

wherefore should we <S%H4191>die<s%> before thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, both we and our <S%H127>land<s%>? <S%H7069>buy<s%> us and our <S%H127>land<s%> for <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and we and our <S%H127>land<s%> will be <S%H5650>servants<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>: and <S%H5414>give<s%> us <S%H2233>seed<s%>, that we may <S%H2421>live<s%>, and not <S%H4191>die<s%>, and that the <S%H127>land<s%> be not <S%H3456>desolate<s%>.

So <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> all the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>; for the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H4376>sold<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7704>field<s%>, because the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was <S%H2388>sore<s%> upon <S%H776>them<s%>: and the land became <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s.

And as for the <S%H5971>people<s%>, he <S%H5674>removed<s%> them to the <S%H5892>cities<s%> from one <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> even to the other end <S%H7097>thereof<s%>.

Only the <S%H127>land<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> bought <S%H7069>he<s%> <S%H3548>not<s%>: for the priests had a <S%H2706>portion<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and did <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H2706>portion<s%> which <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H4376>them<s%>; wherefore they sold not their <S%H127>land<s%>.

Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H7069>Behold<s%>, I have bought you this <S%H3117>day<s%> and your <S%H127>land<s%> for <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>: <S%H1887>lo<s%>, here is <S%H2233>seed<s%> for <S%H2232>you<s%>, and ye shall sow the <S%H127>land<s%>.

And it shall come to pass at the <S%H8393>ingatherings<s%>, that ye shall <S%H5414>give<s%> a <S%H2549>fifth<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3027>parts<s%> shall be your <S%H2233>own<s%>, for seed of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and for your <S%H400>food<s%>, and for them of your <S%H1004>households<s%>, and for <S%H398>food<s%> for your little <S%H2945>ones<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%>, Thou hast saved our <S%H2421>lives<s%>: let us <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%>, and we will be <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7760>made<s%> it a <S%H2706>statute<s%> concerning the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, that <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> should have the <S%H2569>fifth<s%>; only the <S%H127>land<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> alone became <S%H7535>not<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen<s%>; and they gat them <S%H270>possessions<s%> <S%H6509>therein<s%>, and were fruitful, and <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H2421>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H6240>seventeen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>: so the days of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, the <S%H8141>years<s%> of his <S%H3967>life<s%>, were a hundred <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

And the <S%H3117>time<s%> drew <S%H7126>near<s%> that <S%H3478>Israel<s%> must <S%H4191>die<s%>: and he <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4672>him<s%>, If now I have found <S%H2580>favor<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>, <S%H7760>put<s%>, I pray <S%H3027>thee<s%>, thy hand under my <S%H3409>thigh<s%>, and <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H2617>kindly<s%> and <S%H571>truly<s%> with <S%H6912>me<s%>: bury me <S%H4714>not<s%>, I pray thee, in Egypt;

but when I <S%H7901>sleep<s%> with my <S%H1>fathers<s%>, thou shalt <S%H5375>carry<s%> me out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H6912>bury<s%> me in their <S%H6900>burying-place<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H6213>do<s%> as thou hast <S%H1697>said<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7650>Swear<s%> unto <S%H7650>me<s%>: and he sware unto <S%H3478>him<s%>. And Israel <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself upon the <S%H4296>bed<s%>'s <S%H7218>head<s%>.
